text: (waidya ruwan em jayathunga ge 71 karalla aarambhaye sita awasanaya dakwa purna samalochanayak ) kruthiya asureni)
ehidi aya meseda pawasuwaya.
mama bebe kenek wageda ?
samahara tiyub layit innawa ne..
sapthambar 12 sita mema shabha ismathu we.gruha jiwithaya- gruha jiwithaya pilibanda salakana kala etharamma yahapath yayi kiwahaki karunu kapi penenne natha.

“mehi ranganayen dayaka wanne gihan pranandu, umayangana wikramasinha, ruwan malith piris, chamari nisansala, mihiri priyangani, rohitha jayakodi, kusal madhuranga, ishara wikramasinha, susanga kahandawala aarachchi, nayanthara sandamali yana nalu niliyan pirisayi.
mama eliyata bahinakota malaminiyak issarahata muna gahunath mata ganak na..
mese kelam nokima, kelamata anubalanodima, kelamehi digin digata noyedima, eyin sathutunowima samagiyehi alima samagiya pinisa katha kirima samagikota sathutuwima aadiyen pirisidu bawa weyi.

(champika aැmathige sahea්dara parlimenthu sanuhare bahutharayak ee duppath dhanayath seara kana eka wenama katha kala yuthu karanayak)me rate nidahas adhyapanayen bihiwunu ape samahara ‘ugaththu’ lankawe thibena depala wikunala ee tika dolarwalata maru karagena ratinuth pitawela yannama yanawa.

parakramabahu rajathuma thama mawa wenuwen ‘sunethradewi’ namin piriwen wiharasthanayak karawana lada athara ’subhadra’ nam wu bisawaka namin subhadrarama wiharasthanaya idikala bawa janaprawada gatha prawruththiyaki.

rate kisiyam ho palath palana aayathana pramanayaka balaya labaganima podujana pakshaya wisin labiya haki jayagrahanayak wuwath, rate dewana thanata watena sandhanayaka dewana thanata watennata maithri parshwayata awashya natha.
monade wunath, oba aadaraya karana kena ekka wiwruthawa katha karanna.
ema pramanaya dimata obathumata shakthiyak natha obage siyaluma dhanyagara walawath , rajadhaniye, siyaluma dhanyagara walawath lokaye siyaluma dhanyagara walawath epamana dhanya natha.

me siddhiye di polisiya athin rajakari athapasuwimak ho waraddak siduwa athida yanna soya balima sandaha polispathiwarayage niyamayen parikshanayak aarambha kara athayi polis madhya pa්rakashaka polis adhikari ruwan gunasekara mahatha pawasayi.

idiri dina kihipayedi wisheshayen janawari 20 wana dina sita diwayine pawathina wiyali saha shitha kalaguna thathwaye thawakalika wenasak apeksha kala haki bawa kalagunawidya departhamenthuwa sandahan karayi.

ee nisa bariwelawath maithripala sirisena mahatha dinuwath, thawath awurudu dekak me rate janadhipathi wenne mahinda rajapaksha yi...”

atharamagadi hamba wechchi eka eka widiye minissu math ekka katha karanna oona welada kohedo, hith athule dahak prashna thiyagena mawa nawaththanna haduwath man ee kisima kenek wenuwen eka ma eka mohothak wath dunne na. ...

parajitha hanguman samanayata heroyin welata wada balasampanna iyukodol ha pinas amaruwata koken
danma poth achchugahanna mahansiwenne nathiwa digatama liyanna” ohu kiweya.

deshiya kiri nishpadana karmanthayata dawantha aayojanayak ek karamin kargils samagama wisin mirigama pradeshaye sthapitha karana lada kothmale nawa kiri nishpadanagaraya janadhipathi garu maithripala sirisena mathithuma athin ada (03) perawaruwe wiwrutha kerini.

"hed bas" kiwoth hamoma dannawa ..anika samantha malli ee ape iskole sar kenekuge puthek .miniha math pan katewath thiyanna kamathi na eeth bona ewun ekka ekata inna nam godak kamathiyi ..eelangata hitiye anushka kiyala mage parana mithrayek .miniha nam eda bila hitiye kunu wenna .eelangata lahiru saha mama .sandaru kiwama mawa kawuruth dannawa ..lahiru ape game newe..
eekayi samahara aya kiyanne palamu jayagrahanaya ahambau siddha wimak wenna puluwan, dethun parak wath jayagrahanaya karala kusalathawayak athayi kiyath oppu karanna awashya yayi kiyala.
dewanna mahichchatha pudgalaya, thunwanna papichchatha namin handunwanawa.athrichchatha namin handunwana thanaththa kawadawath labunu deyin thrupthiyata path kala nohaki wanawa.
ethakota anith aya ges karanna oona mokakda hari uththare kiyala.
eekayi thiyena samanathwaya..
aththatama ada lowa boho ratawala daruwan ha tharuna tharuniyan mudritha paththara kiyawanne naha.
mun degollama paradaya !
dath thiyena kalema hambunoth ohoma kiyanne na newa...

umbaata ayithi de umbaata nodi kohomada ban..?

adath me paththata kiyanne udunuwara thamayi.

atuwawangen thorawa mebandu boho thanaka aruth gatha nohaka.

ohu kopamana ingrisiwadi wuye da yath ohu engalanthaye wanshadhipathin athara janapriya winodanshayak wu nari dadayame yama enam, ashwayin pita nagi dada ballan da samanga dadayakkara pirisak winoda gamanaka swarupayen dadayame yana athara nariyeku wata kota mara damimakata da sahabhagi wiya.
ithin man monawa karannada deyiyane, mage inboks eke eemel godayi.
dan mangalyayan sanwidhanaya karana eka wruththiyak widihata kalata ee kale ehema ekak karanna winda duka mathak weddi hinath yanawa ooseta....

17wana aandu krama wyawastha sanshodhanaya kriyathmaka kirima: megin sidu wanne polisiya, adhikaranaya, rajya sewawa, jilmat damana mathiwarana departhamenthuwa wani aayathana deshapalana balapamata yatath no wana swadhina komishan yatathata path wimayi.
‘‘mokada umbaa sayilans wune...?
eyage aththa nama kiwwata eyawath katha kale na.
ape rajjuruwo aththatama wiruddha adahas walata oya tharam baya mokada?
inpasu aleks fonseka piyathuma wisin mehi idiri katayuthu aarambha kara diwya pujawan pawathwimata piyawara gena atha.
an kawara kalekatath wada warthamanaye di rawana raju pilibanda soyannata, gaweshanaya karannata boho denek pelambai sitithi.
oya lamaya yoga dannawada...

eeta amatharawa chinayata erehiwa amerikawa wisin panawa thibena thiru badu hethuwen idiriyedi china rajaya naya aadhara ho pradanayan sandaha noyanu athayi da aarthika wisheshagnyayo rajayata penwa di atha.
widyuth madhyayada makkada kiyaganna ewun okkoma ekathu wela ahana balana ewunta salli didi gon aathal denawa.
nawa rajya thanthrikayin siw denek janapathita aktha patha්ra bhara deyi
ee thidenagema aashawa wi thibune pathrayaka upa karthruwarayaku wimaya.
chithra poth pitu 80 ekayi
lankawe madhya ohuta eltitiee hithawadiyaku lesa hanwadu gasannata uthsaha kalada thaman swadhina kalakaruwaku bawa ohu siya pa්rathama kruthiyen penwa atha.

halal haram yanuwen muslim waru anubhawa kala yuthu aahara pana, andum palandum yanadiya kumak da yannath chandrawankaya (islamiya masaye arambaima wenuwen nawa sanda balima) niwedanaya kirime adhikariyath apa sathu yayi me ulama waru pawasathi.
namuth siriyawata giya eyata thama aasa karapu de thama hoyapu de labuna wageyi kiyana kathawalin mata danune.”
pura duwa paninna
mema apal gaswala athi rogi athu ha diragiya athu kapa iwath kala yuthuya .mema athuwala kapu sthanawala dilira nashaka thawariya yuthuya.
hanmati - wanapala yanadiyen peni yanuye laukika wyawaharayehi da binduwa yedena bawa yi.

labadena mulu ulu pramanaya laksha 279 ki.
nithiya ha samaya pilibanda nawa kabinat amathyawaraya lesa agramathya ranil wikramasinha mahatha path kara thibe.

mata hankada wela wath lunu rasayak aawe naha.
ikmanin dennath oonane.
kiyala anith ewunuth mugen dan ahanawa.
sthuthiyi age kirimata...

basnahira palath sabha aandukara alewi mawlana mahatha wisin wisuruwa hari athara dakunu palath sabhawa kumari balasuriya mahathmiya wisin wisuruwa harinu labiya.kata ehema pitinma arunu his kabalak mannarama samuha mini walen

emenma 1000 napa adhiwegi margayak lankawa purama idikarana athara.

naradayi, ammayi dennam hina wuna.
hondawelawata mata inne malli kenek.

me anuwa tharagawaliye prabalayan lesa salakunu galkissa widya widyalaya palamu tharagaye di ma mathale santha thomas widyalayata lakunu 62 – 00ka dawantha parajayak athkara dimata samath wu athara owun siya dewana tharagaye di kolambaa mahanama widyalayatath ewanima amathaka nowana padamak iganwuye lakunu 76 – 00k lesayi.
eheth kalayath samangama ohu ithama ahinsaka satheku bawata path wi yayi dirghakalina nirikshanayen siti wanajiwi niladharin kiyayi.
ethakota eken labena mudala thanikarama labhaya.
patta kiyanne aaye kiyanna wadan na..
mewara sahithya mahothsawaya balanna dawas hatharema enna.

handimite digata wada nuwanathi gahaniya, pansiyayak puthun labu malin upan padmawathi, putheku apayata thaba danak di janapadayak dinu thissa aadi mathruka kihipayak osse mema granthaya gonukara atha.
ee nisa loka saukhya sanwidhanaye warthawa api piligatha yuthuyi yayi rajitha kiweya.

wandi gewim sahanadhara pohora labana gowin sandaha wana waga rakshana thakseru kamituwe nirdesha, gowijana sanwardhana niladhari wisin gowijana sanwardhana komasaris wetha idiripath kirimen anathuruwa, wandi gewime idiri katayuthu sandaha ema illumpath jathika rakshana bhara aramudala wetha idiripath kala yuthu ya.
ema namayan mese we,
sanskruthiya yanu kumakda?
siyallo ma 'dan sanathkumara brahma thema yam dewiyakuge palanga risiyenne nam, ee dewiyage palangehi indaganne ya' yi nihanda wa dohoth nama palangin hidith.
matharadi thibuna ranawiru samarum uthsawaya me hama uthsawayakadima jathika kodiya ithama simakari lesa thamayi bhawitha kara thibune.
mema wada warjanaya aarambha wimath samaga samagame kotas wala ganudenu mila 10% aasanna pramanayakin pahala yamak sidu wi athi bawa ganudenu nirikshanayedi peni yanawa.
honda paththata gaththoth samahara wita ape rate pilika gana danuwathkama wadiwela ho eewa soyaganna saha pa්rathikara karana pa්ramanaya wadi wela ho wage wenna puluwan.
sinama shalawe chithrapatiyak balana eෙkan athi rasawindanaye ha yu tiyub eke balana eke wenasa handunana aya eyi.eeth chithrapatiyata wena asadharanaya.

mese an siyallatath wada lenin ha trotski wisin deshapalanikawa nawa pana ganwu bolshewik pakshaya, rusiyanu kamkaru panthiye athi mahath bahutharaye pakshapathithwaya dina ganimin, soldaduwan saha dawantha gambada gowijanakaya ge sahaya laba, loka samajawadi wiplawaye pa්rathama wedi muraya yana watahimen lokaye pa්rathama kamkaru panthi rajyaya pihituwiya .
ayawa awasan gaman yawana pemwatha aya samanga "ekwa wasaya" kara athi athara owun dedena nithiyen wiwahapath wi sitiye naha.
me sambandhawa lipi liyannam...

akka ihalin samath.

thamanta dara gatha haki tharame unu wathura walin pongawa gath kapu ho linan redi kaballak wathura mirika hara ema wedanawa danena sthanaye thawima sidu kala yuthu athara ehidida ema unusuma wadipura gelehi mansha peshin wetha laba nodimada wadagathya.
udaharana lesa pohora, gewathu apad raw ya ha boga awashesha yana siyalla jaiwa skandha p rabhawa weyi.

ee wenakota mage wayasa awurudu 23 k withara wenawa.
pitiye gedara aberathna pawasanne kanagatuweni.
mata salakiyayuthu mattamakin wayalinaya ple karathahaki.

ee anuwa indiya kandayama pandu wara 48 pandu 04 k thula siyaluma kridakayin dawi lakunu 296 k raskaranu labiya. pilithuru inima krida kala dakunu aprika kandayama pandu wara 49 pandu 04 k thula kadulu 07 k dawi lakunu 300 k raskaramin jayagrahanaya thahawuru karanu labiya.
indiya primiyar lig krikat tharagawaliye eeye(15) pawathi tharagawalin kolkata nayitrayidars kandayama saha dillideyar dewils kandayama jaya ganimata samath wuni.
thaththagen passe ayya anthani pej thamayi me katayuthu karagena giye.
mese aapada sahana salasimedi jathibheda ha aagam bheda ikmawa samastha lak samajaya (thawakalikawa ho) eksath wu aakarayada samaja madhya sanniwedana samaharak thulin apata penenawa.
namuth pasalen atharinne daksha lamayin tikak.
athul wena thana puwaruwa.

me jada deshapalakayo nisa kawadawath me rate minissunta hariyanne na.ee thispandaha piliwelakata ape rate rakiya wirahithyan yawwanam,apita labena kota eka thawa wadiwenawa.aarthikayeth wishala wardhanayak athi wenawa.ada ape rate ganu balamehewarakam karanna madaperadiga yanna oone na.deshapalakayange madiya thara karaganna un oona deyak karawi.hama aanduwakma eka wageyi.hama aanduwakama kamkaru amathilata koti ganan minissunta hulan.
namuth ohu karana de hariyata karanawa.
kunu dirapathweddi mithen wayuwa hadena bawa kiwa.
( koheta hari) minisunge aakalpamaya sanwardhanayak awashyawanne ethanadi.
mahajanayage mudal mese dushitha aakarayen wandi lesa gewimata siduwi thibima sambandhayen aanduwa anugamanaya karanne kumana andame kriya margayakda?
eyada tharangata kandayame sthanaya ahimi wimata balapa thibena karunak.
obage mila thiranaya
parana malunge karamalwalata aluth malu le dama rathu pata karayi.
udaperuwa me wirodhathawata dina kihipayakata pera api bandarawelata giyemu.
mata theruna wade aththa kiyala.
eeka 35 sita 50 dakwa wenas wenawa..
ehema nathnam naya ganna oonama kenekwa methanin nirikshanaya kerenawada?
"ayi man kalin eksre eka pennuwe..eeka balala madi kiyala neda skan ekak karanna kiwwe..dan mokatada aayemath eksre ekak karanne..?"

sinhala bhashawe kiyamanak thiyenawa “kanna dunnu atha hapakana jathiye aya“kiyala.thrasthawadin sambandhayenda kiyanna thiyenne ee ha samana kathawak.mokada sinhala bauddha api ape sadharanathwaya,hadiyawa shilachara bawa,apakshapathi bawa wani uthum gunanga kopamana pradarshanaya kalath,thrasthawadin eya salakanne durwalakamak widihata bawa ee udawiyage kriyakarakam ithihasayata anuwa hondakarawama pahadiliyi.namuth nithyanukula rajayak hatiyata ape wagakima apita mona tharam sathurukam karapu kenekuta wuwath elawa elawa pahara nodima.ehema apita thamayi thawa yuda aparadha chodanath nanganne me batahira wijathika kumanthranakaruwan	atikichcha 2012-06-15 10:19:26
